String.string: Join Jelena in Sinestral Manor. [Quest will be completed only when you select Sinestral Manor (Solo) from the {@linkCreature:216#1501#Teleportal}]
Meet Jelena at the ladder to the ground floor.
Use the ladder to reach the bottom of the Manor and defeat the count and countess.
May your strength suffice. Let's go!
Fight alongside Jelena to the ladder room.
Use the ladder to reach the Manor Cellar. Destroy the {@LinkCreature:3002#21#Dementalith Generator} there and defeat Malgarios.
Use the {@LinkCreature:3002#1010#teleportal} to leave Sinestral Manor and check in with {@LinkCreature:216#1028#Jelena} in the secret entrance.
